lead_paragraph: LEEDS--Dalia. The American Friends of the Israel Philharmonic Orchestra Board of Directors and Staff mourn the passing of our esteemed former Board Member, Dalia Leeds. Dalia was a valued benefactor and her leadership and commitment to AFIPO's mission and generosity will contribute to the future of the IPO for generations to come. Our heartfelt sympathy to her husband Laurence, and her entire family. We shall always remember Dalia as a true friend and philanthropist. Zubin Mehta and Itzhak Perlman, Co-Chairmen David A. Hirsch, President Lauren Veronis, Chrm Exec Comm and VP Sara Fabrikant, Claudio Pincus, Marilyn Ziering, Richard Ziman Vice-Presidents 1/3
